markdown: <::flowchart : CENTRAL NERVOUS SYSTEM : ↓ (dashed arrow) : HYPOTHALAMUS : ↓ (solid arrow, labeled "THYROTROPIN RELEASE HORMONE") : ANTERIOR PITUITARY : ↓ (solid arrow, labeled "THYROID STIMULATING HORMONE (TSH)") : THYROID : - Left section: ACTIVATED I : ↑ (solid arrow, labeled "(PEROXIDASE)") : IODIDE : - This step is BLOCKED BY THIOUREA DERIVATIVES (dashed line) : - Right section: RESERVE OF PRE-FORMED T₃, T₄ : ↓ (solid arrow, labeled "T₃, T₄") : CIRCULATION : - Feedback loop from T₃, T₄ (from THYROID) to ANTERIOR PITUITARY (dashed arrow, labeled "TSH INCREASED BY LOW T₃, T₄") : - Feedback loop from THYROID (ACTIVATED I) to THYROID (RESERVE OF PRE-FORMED T₃, T₄) (dashed arrow) : flowchart::> FIGURE 6

splits.markdown: <::flowchart : CENTRAL NERVOUS SYSTEM : ↓ (dashed arrow) : HYPOTHALAMUS : ↓ (solid arrow, labeled "THYROTROPIN RELEASE HORMONE") : ANTERIOR PITUITARY : ↓ (solid arrow, labeled "THYROID STIMULATING HORMONE (TSH)") : THYROID : - Left section: ACTIVATED I : ↑ (solid arrow, labeled "(PEROXIDASE)") : IODIDE : - This step is BLOCKED BY THIOUREA DERIVATIVES (dashed line) : - Right section: RESERVE OF PRE-FORMED T₃, T₄ : ↓ (solid arrow, labeled "T₃, T₄") : CIRCULATION : - Feedback loop from T₃, T₄ (from THYROID) to ANTERIOR PITUITARY (dashed arrow, labeled "TSH INCREASED BY LOW T₃, T₄") : - Feedback loop from THYROID (ACTIVATED I) to THYROID (RESERVE OF PRE-FORMED T₃, T₄) (dashed arrow) : flowchart::> FIGURE 6
